name: Boundless Unity (Prototype)
description:
An RPG telling the story of a man from Earth trying to save an alien world...inhabited by Mages.

Edward is summoned by accident to the world of Vasharen, and with the help of the locals, he will learn about his new surroundings while gathering the magic gems that will seal away the evil of the land forever.

Work on this prototype has stalled a bit, and with the release of RPG Maker MV, I decided to stop work on this VX Ace version.

Please leave a comment with your thought on this prototype, and how it can be improved on when production begins again.
